name: Barkskin
description: Skin becomes as touch as bark, +4 armor bonus to AC for 40 rounds.

name: Blast of Light
description: A blast of light launches from the casters hands and automatically hits all targets in the area of effect for 2d6 points of damage.

name: Bless
description: All allies in the area of effect receive a +1 to their BAB for 5 rounds per level of the caster.

name: Bull Strength
description: +4 strength

name: Burning Hands
description: A burning cone of flames shoots from the caster's fingers, causing 1d4+1 damage per level to a maximum of 5d4+5 at level 5.

name: Call Lightning
description: the caster calls a storm of lightning that automatically hits all targets in the area of effect for 1d6 points of damage per caster level.

name: Cat Grace
description: +4 dexterity

name: Cause Disease
description: Enemy receives -2 to all stats and -2 to hit.

name: Cloudkill
description: Poisonous gas fills the area, causing 6d6+10 damage to any creature that fails a saving throw vs fortitude.

name: Cure Critical Wounds
description: The caster heals himself or another party member for 32 hitpoints

name: Cure Minor Wounds
description: The caster heals himself or another party member for 8 hitpoints

name: Cure Moderate Wounds
description: The caster heals himself or another party member for 16 hitpoints

name: Cure Serious Wounds
description: The caster heals himself or another party member for 24 hitpoints

name: Defensive Stance
description: Defensive Stance provides +2 Strength, +4 Constitution, +2 Saving Throws, and +4 Armor Class for 3 turns, but the character is rooted to the spot for the duration of the spell.

name: Dimension Door
description: Teleport to another location on the combat map.

name: Dispel Magic
description: Removes various buff and debuff spells from a target.

name: Elemental Resistance
description: The target gains a 30% resistance to cold and fire damage.

name: Energy Drain
description: This spell saps the energy (SP) of the target victim and transfers it to the caster. It requires a successful attack. (8d4 sp)

name: Entangle
description: Fills a 3x3 square area with entangling plant growth.

name: Fireball
description: A fireball launches from the casters hands and automatically hits all targets in the area of effect for 1d6 points of damage per caster level.

name: Flame Fingers
description: A cone of flames launch from the casters hands and automatically hit all targets in the area of effect for 1d3 points of damage per caster level.

name: Flame Strike
description: A column of fire is called down from the sky and automatically hits all targets in the area of effect for 1d6 points of damage per caster level.

name: Free Action
description: Removes any effects that casue the player to be held or immobile such as Hold and Web spells.

name: Greater Elemental Resistance
description: The target gains a 70% resistance to cold and fire damage.

name: Greater Mirror Image
description: creates 6 images

name: Gust of Wind
description: A large gust of wind knocks enemies down for two rounds.

name: Haste
description: The target is hasted for five rounds, gaining one attack per round and moving two more squares.

name: Hold
description: Holds one target for 3 rounds

name: Ice Storm
description: An ice storm launches from the casters hands and automatically hits all targets in the area of effect for 1d3 points of damage per caster level.

name: Insect Swarm
description: A swarm of biting insects that do damage over time and reduce the target's attack and defence by 2.

name: Lay on Hands
description: The caster heals himself or another party member for 1d2+1 hitpoints for each level after level 1 for upto 12 levels

name: Lightning
description: A lightning bolt launches from the casters hands and automatically hits all targets in the area of effect for 1d6 points of damage per caster level.

name: Longstrider
description: The target gains an increase to movement by 2 squares.

name: Mace of Stunning
description: Holds one target for 2 rounds

name: Mage Armor
description: An invisible field of force surrounds the caster, providing a +4 armor bonus to AC for 20 rounds per level.

name: Mage Blast
description: A magic blast of energy launches from the caster and hits a target for 1d3+1 points of damage upon a successful ranged attack. The Wizard's blast increases by 1d3+1 per level of the caster up to level 10.

name: Mage Bolt
description: A magic bolt of energy launches from the casters side and automatically hits a target for 1d4+1 points of damage. Additional bolts are gained for every two levels after level one. A maximum of five bolts at 9th level and beyond.

name: Magic Stone
description: Caster launches a small stone that automatically hits a target for 1d3+1 points of damage. Additional stones are gained for every two levels after level one. A maximum of five stones at 9th level and beyond.

name: Mass Cure Minor Wounds
description: Heals all party members in the area of effect for 8 HP each.

name: Mass Elemental Resistance
description: All allies in the area of effect gain a 30% resistance to cold and fire damage.

name: Mass Protection
description: All allies in the area of effect receive a +2 to their AC and saving throws for 10 rounds.

name: Minor Drain
description: This spell saps the health of the target victim and transfers it to the caster. It requires a successful attack. (1d4+1 hp)

name: Mirror Image
description: creates 3 images

name: Neutralize Poison
description: Removes any poison effects from a player

name: Poison Light
description: poison of 1d2

name: Poison Medium
description: poison of 1d4

name: Prayer
description: All allies in the area of effect receive a +2 to their BAB and +2 to damage for 4.

name: Protection
description: One ally receives a +2 to their AC and saving throws for 10 rounds.

name: Remove Disease
description: Removes any effects that casue the player to be diseased.

name: Silence
description: Creates an area of silence that prevents spell casting for each round that they remain in the area and fail a saving throw.

name: Sleep
description: Puts creatures to sleep for 2 rounds.

name: Sleet Storm
description: An ice storm launches from the casters hands and automatically hits all targets in the area of effect for 1d3 points of damage per caster level per round and lasts for 4 rounds. It also can cause blindness.

name: Slow
description: The target needs to make a saving throw vs will or is slowed for one turn, losing one attack per round and moving two fewer squares.

name: Spike Growth
description: Calls spiky plan growth that casues 1d4 damage and slows movement by 2 squares.

name: Spirit Hammer
description: Caster launches a magical hammer that can attack from range and does 1d8+3 damage upon a successful attack roll (uses dexterity for attack modifier).

name: Stinking Cloud
description: a cloud of noxious gas fills the area of effect causing all living to take 1-3 points of damage each round that they remain in the area. They may also begin chocking causing them to be helpless (held).

name: Stone Skin
description: Stone Skin

name: Stone Spikes
description: Calls spiky plant growth that casues 1d4 damage and slows movement by 2 squares.

name: Vampiric Touch
description: This spell saps the health of the target victim and transfers it to the caster. It requires a successful attack. (1d4+1 hp)

name: Virtue
description: Grants the caster the ability to absorb 10 HP

name: Vocalize
description: Removes any effects that casue the player to be silent such as a silence spell.

name: Web
description: Fills a 5x5 square area with sticky spiderweds.

name: Major Rejuvenation
description: The caster gains 20 SP

name: Minor Regeneration
description: Places a minor regeneration effect on a PC that lasts for 4 rounds giving the PC 2 hit points of healing per round.

name: Minor Healing
description: The caster heals himself or another party member for 8 hitpoints

name: Moderate Healing
description: The caster heals himself or another party member for 16 hitpoints

name: Mass Minor Healing
description: Heals all party members for 8 HP each.
